title: Heron's Path
description: Alethea Eason's newest book, The Heron's Path, has the grace of the river Talum that flows through its pages. Step into the world of Katy and her delicate sister Celeste where native ways are threatened by "civilization," and the Old Ones haunt the forest with their longing to return to their true home. Will Celeste finally understand her wanderings and visions? Will Katy and aged Olena keep her from the clutches of the evil wei-ni-la? Follow them "north to the true wilderness, dark with ancient trees, where the Nanchuti struggle to keep their sacred songs from vanishing." Enter into a magical world and be swept into adventure as the two sisters travel the Heron's Path.
author: Alethea Eason
